documentation.xhtml:p: Sensor that monitors bottle jam.
Conveyor speed encoder.
Speed control input.
Memory for enabling conveyor output.
Conveyor motor output.
Alarm that sounds when jam occurs.
Output command that controls conveyor speed.
Indicator light for conveyor status.
Infeed & Conveying
Input switch that designates conveyor can start.
Input that designates bottle is at filling station.
Input that designates bottle is at capping station.
Input that designates bottle is at labeling station.
Stop the conveyor at the filling station.
Stop the conveyor at the capping station.
Stop the conveyor at the labeling station.
Conveyor output.
Bottle Positioning & Detection
Input that designates bottle is at filling station.
Input that checks if bottle is okay to fill.
Input timer that tells system how long to fill bottle to full.
Input sensor that monitors flowrate into bottle.
Input sensor that monitors temperature of liquid into bottle.
Memory that stores if its okay to fill.
Output fill valve.
Output fill pump speed.
Alarm that sounds when bottle fill goes wrong.
Filling Subsystem
Input that arbitrates the minimum tank level.
Input that acts as a pressure control.
Memory that stores if its okay to pump.
Output fill pump speed.
Alarm that sounds when tank is not at optimal conditions.
Pump & Fluid Utilities
Input that determines if the cap level within the hopper is above the minium allowed amount
Input that designates a cap is at the hopper
Input that determines if the cap torque sensor is within maximum specification
Input that determines if the cap torque sensor is within minimum specification
Memory that stores if it is okay to cap
Alarm to notify that cap hopper level is low
Output Capping Bottle
Alarm to notify if the actuator is out of specification
Capping Subsystem
Input that designates a bottle is at the labeling station
Input that indicates a label is present at the labeling station
Input that checks the positioning of the label to ensure it is applied properly
Output for application of the label on to the bottle
Alarm to notify if the actuator is out of specification
Labeling Subsystem
Input to detect the level that the bottle has been filled to to ensure it is within specification
Input to detect the condition of the neck, ensuring there are no cracks or damage present on the bottle neck
Input to detect the weight of the bottle does not exceed the threshold
Input to detect the cap is not overtorqued
Output to reject bottle if any of the inputs detect faults
Quality and Inspection Subsystem
